735070.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - シナリオ「越後の義将」/Scenario "The Dutiful Lord of Echigo"
735070.description:
An additional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi."

Harukage Nagao succeeded his father, Tamekage Nagao of Echigo, as leader of the Nagao clan.

However, his weak nature soon had control passing to his younger brother Kagetora.

Kagetora took the battlefield, determined to show the land his own brand of justice and duty.

The battle of the man who would be known as the God of War begins here.

▼How to use
To play, select "New Game." Then, from the scenario selection screen, select "The Dutiful Lord of Echigo."
735070.supported_languages:
日语*, 繁体中文, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
